IsCameraView.description: Whether the positioning of this object is used as camera position(?)

ZRotation.description: The amount this camera is rotated on the Z axis.

Distance.description: The distance this camera stays away from the player.

PathUID.description: The UID of the path used by this object.

PathOffset.description: How much this camera's position should be offset from the path.

ReversePathFront.description: Whether to use the back of the path as the front, and vice-versa.

UsePathVerticalComponent.description: Whether the path should affect the camera's vertical movement.

AngleSensitivity.description: How much this camera is allowed to rotate?

AngleSensitivityBoost.description: How much this camera is allowed to rotate while boosting?

Azimuth.description: I'm really tired and this one's hard to explain, please just google azimuth thx.

GravityOffset.description: How much to offset this camera's position in the direction of the player's gravity?

PlayerOffset.description: How much to offset this camera's position from the player's position.

PlayerOffsetType.description: How to offset this camera's position from the player's position.

FollowType.description: How this camera should follow the player.

Extra.value: A 3D Camera set to follow the player along a path.
